about_the_game:
Downloading this DLC requires you to re-download the full game. All customization items applied can be manually removed by the player. In order to continue from a save file overwritten with the DLC content, the DLC must be installed.

Celebrate the White Xmas with style with these festive clothes and decorations for Drug Dealer Simulator 2! Nothing like an ugly sweater and a candy cane you can whack people with to wake up the holiday spirit.

This free DLC includes 39 hideout decorations, 3 festive outfits, 6 new weapons and 2 Christmas-themed vehicles.

Hideout decorations:
  • Christmas weed tree
  • Christmas biscuits
  • Wooden branch
  • Christmas doily
  • Fireplace
  • Fireplace wood set
  • Fireplace toolset
  • Christmas garland
  • 10x gift box
  • Gingerman plate
  • Christmas snowball
  • Christmas lamp
  • Christmas Nutcracker
  • 2x rags
  • Reindeer decoration
  • Santa statue
  • Sleigh
  • 11x Christmas ornament
  • Wreath

Weapons:
  • Candy stick
  • Lollipop
  • Twig
  • Santa statue
  • Bluntie
  • Snowman

Clothes:
  • 3x Christmas sweater

Vehicles:
  • Christmas boat
  • Christmas car

Celebrate the White Xmas with style with these festive clothes and decorations for Drug Dealer Simulator 2! Nothing like an ugly sweater and a candy cane you can whack people with to wake up the holiday spirit.

name: Drug Dealer Simulator 2: White Xmas Free DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 570 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommented

short_description: Celebrate the White Xmas with style with these festive clothes and decorations for Drug Dealer Simulator 2!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Czech, Romanian, Hungarian, Slovak, Korean
*languages with full audio support
